text: 13.34: Mt 25.14; Ru 12.36-38Mba tuk, ana guma wo phena thav, harigi ŋanen vui ne fara muuŋgi. Ana wo phena thav vov, wo phenan wo ŋaari gumgi farve khɨngi. Ana wo phenan mbe farve khɨngiap, wo phenan ŋaari, ana za nta shama mbuav mbe ndɨɨv, khaŋ mba phena thɨm kamani gari guma ga nzuai, ‘Ndu tuituigira ganɨri.’
